article_title: Jackson County hires guards for Health and Human Services building
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox.

article_metadata.description: Jackson County will hire security guards to staff its Health and Human Services building in downtown Medford after seeing growth in its caseload of clients, including those dealing with mental illness.The Jackson County Board of Commissioners authorized a contract Wednesday of up to $166,592 for the Medford-based security firm Maksimum Inc. to provide guards for three years.The guards also will provide security for the multistory parking garage located next to the Health and Human Services
article_metadata.author: Vickie Aldous
